page.title: 18Longball (A school game)
page.content: In longball there are two teams, mixed or girls against boys. The bowler bowls a football, underarm which the runner has to kick and then run to the far end of the playground. The fielding team's aim is to stop the ball and hit the runner with it If hit, while running a player is out of the game, if however, he arrives at the far end of the playground he scores 1 point though if he runs straight back to the bowler's end he scores an extra 2 points. If however,the player stays at the far end of the playground he must run back when the next person kicks the ball and runs down. He will only score a further 1 point for this and if he is hit on the way back he looses all his points. If the player is not hit he rejoins his team to have another go until caught out.
